###########################
## PROGRAMA DA AVALIAÇÃO ##
###########################

ADDI R2,R0,4 - 0010100000000100
ST R0,R2,0 - 0110100100000000

ADDI R2,R0,8 - 0010100000001000
ST R0,R2,1 - 0110100100000001

ADDI R2,R0,12 - 0010100000001100
ST R0,R2,2 - 0110100100000010

ADDI R3,R0,1 - 0010110000000001
ST R0,R3,3 - 0110100110000011

ADDI R3,R0,3 - 0010110000000011
ST R0,R3,4 - 0110100110000100

ADDI R3,R0,7 - 0010110000000111
ST R0,R3,5 - 0110100110000101

ADDI R3,R0,15 - 0010110000001111
ST R0,R3,6 - 0110100110000110

OUT R0,ROUT0 - 1101000000000000
IN R1,RIN0 - 1100010000000000
BEQ R1,R0,-2 - 1000001001111110
LD R2,R0,0 - 0110010000000000

BLT R1,R2,8 - 1000101100001000
LD R2,R0,1 - 0110010000000001

BLT R1,R2,9 - 1000101100001001
LD R2,R0,2 - 0110010000000010

BLT R1,R2,10 - 1000101100001010
LD R3,R0,6 - 0110011000000110

OUT R3,ROUT0 - 1101110000000000
CALL 15 - 1010000000001111
LD R3,R0,3 - 0110011000000011
OUT R3,ROUT0 - 1101110000000000
CALL 15 - 1010000000001111
LD R3,R0,4 - 0110011000000100
OUT R3,ROUT0 - 1101110000000000
CALL 15 - 1010000000001111
LD R3,R0,5 - 0110011000000101
OUT R3,ROUT0 - 1101110000000000
CALL 15 - 1010000000001111
